Description.Text:
The apartments are set in pretty gardens, only 700m from the sandy beach and 10 minutes stroll across the 'bridge' into Santa Eulalia del Rio and all the facilities of this cosmopolitan town.
The Villas del Sol apartments consist of 38 apartments within a 2 storey building set around the swimming pools. Apartments are either 1 bedroom, or studios, complete with bathroom, lounge with sofa bed, kitchenette, a balcony or terrace with sun beds and sun shades.
The apartments have a total of 4 swimming pools 2 of them for children, extensive gardens and children's play area. There is a pool bar and snack bar. Within easy reach of local shops, bars and restaurants.
The family friendly Villas Del Sol makes your stay truly memorable.

The Villas del Sol Apartments are an apartment based complex located half a mile from the beach and only a short walk from Santa Eulalia town centre. Santa Eulalia is a busy town where you`ll find Art Galleries, a Yacht Marina and some of the islands best restaurants, shopping and bars.
